identity.name: Canva
identity.description: Operator of an online graphic design platform intended to democratize design and visual communication access. The company's platform offers drag-and-drop features and professional layouts to consistently design graphics through a vast collection of professionally designed layouts to personalize the design with a stock library of photographs, illustrations, and imagery, enabling companies and users to customize presentations and social media graphics with appropriate layouts.
identity.headquarters: 110 Kippax Street, Surry Hills, New South Wales 2010, Australia

competitors.name: Adobe Creative Cloud
competitors.description: Adobe Creative Cloud is a suite of powerful desktop and mobile applications for graphic design, video editing, web development, and photography. It offers industry-standard tools like Photoshop, Illustrator, and Premiere Pro, catering to professional designers and creatives.
competitors.advantages: Offers a comprehensive and professional-grade toolset with deep functionality for advanced design tasks. Strong integration across its suite of products. Established brand recognition and a large professional user base.

competitors.name: Figma
competitors.description: Figma is a cloud-based design tool that focuses on collaborative interface design and prototyping. It allows multiple users to work on the same design file simultaneously, making it ideal for teams and real-time collaboration.
competitors.advantages: Exceptional real-time collaboration features. Strong focus on UI/UX design and prototyping. Browser-based accessibility, requiring no downloads for basic use. Robust plugin ecosystem.

competitors.name: VistaCreate (formerly Crello)
competitors.description: VistaCreate is an online graphic design tool that provides a wide range of templates and design assets for social media, marketing, and other visual content. It aims to offer an easy-to-use platform for creating professional-looking designs quickly.
competitors.advantages: Offers a vast library of templates and design elements, similar to Canva. Competitive pricing and often bundled with other Vista services. User-friendly interface suitable for beginners.

competitors.name: Piktochart
competitors.description: Piktochart is an online infographic maker and design tool that helps users create visually engaging presentations, reports, and infographics. It offers a variety of templates and design elements tailored for data visualization and storytelling.
competitors.advantages: Specializes in creating professional infographics and data visualizations. Offers tools specifically for reports and presentations. User-friendly interface for non-designers.
